exp.text: During this period I am working as shadow in a project where I learned how to work in a real life projects. Also I get opportunity to learn more day by day about SAP ABAP.

During this period there was 3 months In-house training on SAP ABAP on Hana. And I secured 3rd rank in this training. After that I worked on my upskilling on SAP ABAP on Hana as well as other technical skills as Data Analytics, web development etc.
